job_tasks.phrase: gather and understand business requirements, translating them into effective CPQ configurations
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly reflects the need to comprehend business needs and translate them into technical configurations.

job_tasks.phrase: understanding their business needs and translating them into effective configurations
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the importance of understanding business requirements and applying them to technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Work directly with customers to gather and understand business requirements, translating them into effective CPQ configurations
job_tasks.justification: While customer-facing, the core action involves configuring a system, which falls under the umbrella of applying technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Handle end-to-end configuration of the CPQ system, ensuring alignment with customer requirements while adhering to best practices
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of configuring a system, which is a software development task.
This clearly states the responsibility of configuring software solutions.
This implies the development or application of AI to improve processes.

job_tasks.phrase: Apply AI tools and techniques to automate repetitive tasks, improve configuration speed, and enhance project delivery
job_tasks.justification: This task explicitly mentions the application of AI tools and techniques, which can involve leveraging or adapting models for automation.

soft_skills.phrase: practical, adaptable problem-solver with a hands-on approach to technology
constantly learning, especially in the realm of AI and CPQ

classification.rationale: This role focuses on configuring existing CPQ systems and applying AI tools for automation rather than developing or fine-tuning generative AI models. The primary emphasis is on business understanding and system configuration within a specific domain (CPQ), with AI as an enhancement rather than the core technology being developed.
